      Method checks what button is pressed based on the preset button action command

      Method takes in an int value and doubles it using recursion
      void checkBtns()
      This method is run every time a button is pressed in order to check if the buttons can be combined
      void combineBtns(int intR1, int intC1, int intR2, int intC2)
      Method will double the value in the second button click if the buttons are adjecent to one another, and the icon of the buttons are reset based on the numbers in the intGrid 2d array.
      void displayScore()
      Method is called when the get score button is clicked and will get the score using binary search
      void exitCheckMax()
      Method is called when exit button is clicked and finds the largest number on the board
      javax.swing.ImageIcon getIcon(int intNum)
      Gets a integer for the number in the array and returns a image icon based on the int value
      void resetGame()
      Method is called whenever the reset button is pressed, and enables the start game button to be pressed and resets the board to blank
      void sortColumns()
      Method is called whenever the sort columns button is pressed, the method uses bubble sort on columns of the 2d array in order to sort them in ascending order.
      void sortRows()
      Method is called whenever the sort rows button is pressed, the method uses selection sort on rows of the 2d array in order to sort them in ascending order.
      void startGame()
      Method is called whenever the start game button is pressed
      void winCheck()
      Method is called whenever a pair is matched in the grid is pressed, checks if the user has hit 2048 using linear search.

      • exitCheckMax

        Method is called when exit button is clicked and finds the largest number on the board
        Specified by:
        exitCheckMax in class BoardClass

      • winCheck

        public void winCheck()
        Method is called whenever a pair is matched in the grid is pressed, checks if the user has hit 2048 using linear search. If user hits 2048 this method closes the game board window and displays the winner screen. Method will also save the games score only when the user manages to win the game
        Specified by:
        winCheck in class BoardClass

      • displayScore

        public void displayScore()
        Method is called when the get score button is clicked and will get the score using binary search
        Specified by:
        displayScore in class BoardClass

      • sortColumns

        public void sortColumns()
        Method is called whenever the sort columns button is pressed, the method uses bubble sort on columns of the 2d array in order to sort them in ascending order.
        Specified by:
        sortColumns in class BoardClass

      • sortRows

        public void sortRows()
        Method is called whenever the sort rows button is pressed, the method uses selection sort on rows of the 2d array in order to sort them in ascending order.
        Specified by:
        sortRows in class BoardClass

      • checkBtns

        public void checkBtns()
        This method is run every time a button is pressed in order to check if the buttons can be combined
        Specified by:
        checkBtns in class BoardClass

      • combineBtns

        public void combineBtns(int intR1,
                        int intC1,
                        int intR2,
                        int intC2)
        Method will double the value in the second button click if the buttons are adjecent to one another, and the icon of the buttons are reset based on the numbers in the intGrid 2d array. Method will also update the running score for the game
        Specified by:
        combineBtns in class BoardClass
        Parameters:
        intR1 - row index of the first button clicked
        intC1 - column index of the first button clicked
        intR2 - row index of the second button clicked
        intC2 - column index of the second button clicked
